page.title: 14FAVOURITE FOODS
page.content: {Sunday Roast:}This is a traditional favourite which has kept its popularity because it's one way of getting the family together in a semi formal way once a week. The meal consists of a joint of meat (traditionaly beef but cost often means that pork, lamb or even chicken are sometimes used) roasted in an oven along with potatoes and served with a second vegtable, sauces (gravy) and seasoning. {Beefburger and Chips:}This is a very popular meal especially with children. The beefburger originated in the United States of America and consists of minced beef formed into a round shape and grilled. Served inside a bread roll with Chipped (fried in deep fat)potatoes it is quick to prepare and popular as a{Take Away,} informal meal.
